recommendations: Divya Manasa Yerraguntla “Had a great experience working with Sanyam as his mentor on some exciting projects at MathWorks. The projects involved a mix of knowledge in the fields of Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Object Detection and FPGA deployment to name a few. Being pretty flexible, adaptable and a quick learner he could deliver the needful well within the expected timeframe and showed great enthusiasm throughout. It was a pleasure working with Sanyam and I wish him the best in all his endeavours! ”
